Help.name: Help
Help.description: Display a list of commands. By default the command result is sent to Direct Messages. Using the 'server' key word will make them send in the server instead. Gives more examples when used for specific command/group.
examples: help ┝ Displays the first help page by default.
help 2 ┝ Displays the second help page.
help user ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the commands in the User group.
help uber ┝ Sends a Direct Message with the commands in the Uber command.
help server ┝ The help message is posted on the server.
help user server ┝ The result for the user 'group' is posted on the server.

State.name: State
State.description: Toggle automatic Uber Lab layout posting. Display current state.
examples: state on ┝ Toggles posting state on, the bot will post the labyrinth at a certain time (typically after it's updated on poelab.com) every day.
state off ┝ Toggles the posting state off.
state ┝ Displays the current posting state for the server and channel.

Prefix.name: Prefix
Prefix.description: Sets the prefix for the current server
Prefix.syntax: prefix <symbol> (length no more than 2) or <default> to reset to default. All of the use cases word with the default bot prefix( ~ ) and not just the server prefix.
examples: prefix ┝ Returns the current server prefix.
prefix default ┝ Resets the server prefix to the default bot prefix.
prefix ! ┝ Changes the currnet server prefix to '!'.

Uber.name: Uber
examples: uber ┝ Posts an embed with the Uber/Eternal lab layout

Eternal.name: Eternal
examples: eternal ┝ Posts an embed with the Uber/Eternal lab layout

Merciless.name: Merciless
examples: merciless ┝ Posts an embed with the Merciless lab layout.

Cruel.name: Cruel
examples: cruel ┝ Posts an embed with the Cruel lab layout.

Normal.name: Normal
examples: normal ┝ Posts an embed with the Normal lab layout.
